rules.description: Your current working directory is specified in the system information.
Do not use the ~ character or $HOME to refer to the home directory.
When using replace_in_file, include complete lines in SEARCH blocks, listed in file order.

Wait for confirmation after modifying state/files. Exception: For pre-approved plans, you may proceed with sequential read-only operations without confirmation if no errors occur. If unsure, seek confirmation. Halt if unexpected outcomes arise.
Check parameters before execution, especially paths and patterns. Verify path existence before modification.
If a tool fails repeatedly with similar errors, stop attempts and ask for guidance using ask_followup_question.
After modifying files, verify changes took effect. For complex multi-line changes, use write_to_file if replace_in_file fails.
Always adhere to the specified XML format for tool use.
